DA4BCI 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    LW_covariance()

    Ledoit–Wolf Shrinkage Covariance (to Identity)

    align_riemannian_transport()

    Align SPD Sets by Riemannian Log–Exp Transport

    compute_distance_matrix()

    Pairwise Euclidean Distance Matrix

    compute_energy()

    Energy Distance Between Empirical Distributions

    compute_geodesic()

    Geodesic Distance Between Column Subspaces (Grassmann)

    compute_mahalanobis()

    Mahalanobis distance between two datasets (means with pooled/selected covariance)

    compute_mmd()

    Squared Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD^2) with RBF Kernel

    compute_wasserstein()

    Empirical 1-Wasserstein Distance (Uniform Weights)

    distanceSummary()

    Summarise Distribution Distances Between Domains

    domain_adaptation()

    Unified Interface for Domain Adaptation Methods

    domain_adaptation_art()

    Domain Adaptation via Aligned Riemannian Transport (ART)

    domain_adaptation_coral()

    Correlation Alignment (CORAL)

    domain_adaptation_gfk()

    Geodesic Flow Kernel (GFK) for Domain Adaptation

    domain_adaptation_m3d()

    Manifold-based Multi-step Domain Adaptation (M3D)

    domain_adaptation_mida()

    Maximum/Minimum Independence Domain Adaptation (MIDA)

    domain_adaptation_ot()

    Entropy-Regularized OT (Sinkhorn–Knopp) with Barycentric Mapping

    domain_adaptation_pt()

    Domain Adaptation via Parallel Transport (PT)

    domain_adaptation_riemannian()

    Riemannian-Distance-Based Alignment (RD)

    domain_adaptation_sa()

    Subspace Alignment (SA)

    domain_adaptation_tca()

    Transfer Component Analysis (TCA) for Domain Adaptation

    euclidean_alignment()

    Euclidean Alignment (EA) for EEG Trials

    evaluate_shift()

    Evaluate Distribution Shift Before/After Adaptation

    exp_map()

    Riemannian Exponential Map at an SPD Point

    kmm_weights()

    Kernel Mean Matching Weights

    label_shift_em()

    Prior Adjustment under Label Shift via EM

    log_map()

    Riemannian Logarithmic Map at an SPD Point

    matrix_power()

    Matrix Power for Symmetric Positive Definite Matrices

    orthonormal_complement()

    Orthonormal Complement of a Column Space

    ph_init()

    Page–Hinkley Change Detector: Initialize State

    ph_update()

    Page–Hinkley Change Detector: Update Step

    plot_data_comparison()

    Visual Comparison Before/After Domain Adaptation

    proxy_a_distance()

    Proxy A-Distance via Ridge LDA with K-Fold CV

    rbf_kernel()

    RBF (Gaussian) Kernel Computation

    riemannian_mean()

    Riemannian (Affine-Invariant) Mean of SPD Matrices

    sigma_med()

    Robust Median-Distance Heuristic for RBF Bandwidth
